queries.name: insert_mydbcarrview_10_carrier_magname_one
queries.query:
mutation insert_mydbcarrview_10_carrier_magname_one($object: mydbcarrview_10_carrier_magname_insert_input!) {
  insert_mydbcarrview_10_carrier_magname_one(object: $object) {
    amplitude
    angle
    autorefill
    aux1
    aux2
    aux3
    aux4
    aux5
    aux6
    aux7
    aux8
    aux9
    batchid
    carrierid
    carriersubtype
    carriertype
    componentname
    created
    duration
    feeder
    frequency
    hasbeenloaded
    hydrareachable
    lastchanged
    location
    magazinename
    maxtotaltime
    owner
    previousfeeder
    previouslocation
    previouspauses
    quantity
    quantityatload
    quantityatnew
    servoadjustment
    step
    steplengthtrim
    supplierpartnumber
    timeatfirstload
    timeatlocation
    timeatpause
    timeatwarning
    trayposition
    xoffset
    yacc
    zacc
  }
}
